Program Information.Duration: 12 months (2 semesters in-class, 1 semester work experience)

Contact Related Information: Contact George Brown College for information sessions, domestic and international admissions, fees, financial aid, or program advice. Domestic inquiries: email admissions@georgebrown.ca or visit Admissions section. International students: contact recruitment representatives at the International Contact Us page. Financial matters: email FinAid@georgebrown.ca or visit Financial Aid section. For specific program queries, contact the respective coordinator or chair: Blair.Smith@georgebrown.ca (Digital Media Marketing), john.peco@georgebrown.ca (Centre for Business). General inquiries: email business@georgebrown.ca or call (416) 415-5000 ext. 2160.
